effect.text: Provides 2 Colorless energy. Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.

gameplay.primaryUse: Accelerate Pokemon with Colorless energy costs
gameplay.notes: Extremely valuable card in Base Set. Because it doesn't count as a Basic Energy, it cannot be searched with Energy Search or returned from the discard pile with Super Energy Removal defense. Limited to 4 copies per deck makes it highly contested in decks that need it. Works with any Pokemon that has Colorless energy in their attack costs.
